name.namePart: Museum of Modern Art (New York, N.Y.)

mods.note: Exhibition catalog; Lent by Nelson A. Rockefeller: Study for 'The actor' with profiles of Fernande" (1905-05), "Page of studies (figures and bulls)" (1905), "Kneeling woman combing her hair" (1906), "Harvesters" (1907), "Kneeling figure" (1908), "Girl with mandolin (Fanny Tellier)" (1910), "Le torero" (1911), "Guitar" (1912), "Nessus and Dejanira" (1920), "Study of a hand" (1921), "Pitcher and bowl of fruit" (1931), "The striped bodice" (1943), "Red and white owl" (1953), "The studio ( Visit)" (1954), "The studio (models)" (1954).

subject.topic: Rockefeller, Nelson A. (Nelson Aldrich), 1908-1979 -- Art collections
